org.dspace.administer
Class MetadataImporter

java.lang.Object
  org.dspace.administer.MetadataImporter

public class MetadataImporter
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Richard Jones This class takes an xml document as passed in the arguments and uses it to create metadata elements in the Metadata Registry if they do not already exist The format of the XML file is as follows: icadmin status dateset the workflow status of an item [....]
